name: Dark Vespiquen

passive.name: Hive Guard
passive.effect: Whenever Vespiquen would receive 20 damage or less from any effect, you may deal that damage to a Combee on your bench, instead.

attacks.name: Medic Drones
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Combee on your bench. For each heads, remove 1 damage counter from Vespiquen.

attacks.name: Swarm
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage for each Combee on your bench. You may search your deck for a Combee, reveal it to your opponent, and put it on your bench.

flavor: These powerful Pokemon run entire hives of Combee. Their control is so complete that some scientists prefer to think of their hives as a single organism.
